entry.title: How To Get Work Done: Wrangling Stakeholders And Overcoming Obstacles
entry.summary: Whether you work in-house or for an external agency, we all share one challenge — dealing with stakeholders, be they your boss, colleagues, or clients. In this post, veteran web designer Paul Boag shares his approach to getting things done in even the most challenging organizations.

entry.title: Types of Hard Drives – SATA, PATA, SCSI, and SSD
entry.summary: A hard drive is a non-volatile hardware component on a computer that acts as the storage for all digital content. It holds program files, documents, pictures, videos, music, and more. The non-volatile nature of hard drives means they don’t lose data, even if power is lost. Due to this, they

entry.title: Python Project – How to Build a Wordle Clone using Python and Rich
entry.summary: Wordle is a popular game where you guess a five-letter word in six tries. After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word. entry.title: How To Build A Progressively Enhanced, Accessible, Filterable And Paginated List
entry.summary: Ever wondered how to build a paginated list that works with and without JavaScript? In this article, Manuel explains how you can leverage the power of Progressive Enhancement and do just that with Eleventy and Alpine.js.
